Description:
Ready, set, go!
Refurbished and refreshed family home is a beaut budget buy for first home buyers, downsizers or investors. Located in a quiet street, it's handy to all life's necessities whatever the age group.
It features updated bathroom and laundry, fresh paintwork and new day/night blinds throughout.
Light floods the roomy lounge through big windows overlooking the front garden and rear outdoor entertaining area while the kitchen is equipped with gas cooking, dishwasher, good storage including pantry and breakfast bar dividing it from the meals/family area.
The new bathroom is an all-white affair with matching laundry and separate toilet alongside.
Internal temperature is controlled by gas heating and split system air conditioning but you could spend summer outside with a quiet breakfast or a barbecue lunch under the shade covered alfresco area off the meals/family room.
The neat and secure backyard includes a huge workshop (3.8m x 10.5m) with power and concrete floor, plus a caravan/trailer port, 3m x 3m garden shed and double lock-up carport with roller doors and access through to the shed.
Insights: 25 Wallaby Avenue, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
MODERN & AFFORDABLE
Located in a quiet suburban setting only a few minutes walk to the Kangaroo Flat amenities is this delightful modern home, set on an established allotment and offering the very definition of popular low maintenance living. Ideally suited to investors with current tenant paying $350 per week; or retirees/downsizers with current lease ending in June 2020. This "lock and leave" homely abode is in terrific order and as solid as a rock, meaning it is ready made and requires very little for you to move in and enjoy!
The floor plan is configured with three good sized bedrooms; two are complete with built in robes whilst the master has its own walk in robe and ensuite. A second bathroom includes both shower and bath and a separate toilet services this wing of the home. The spacious open plan kitchen dining and living area is at the heart of the home. The modern kitchen has adequate storage capabilities and boasts up to date appliances inc. electric under bench oven, gas hot plates and dishwasher. The adjoining meals area and generous living space have a lovely sunny outlook to the alfresco area and yard beyond. Ducted heating and cooling are available throughout, plus a split system in the lounge and ceiling fans in the bedrooms, and a single auto garage has direct internal access. There is also 1.2kw solar panels which will really help with those expensive quarterly energy bills.
Outside is 426m2 (approx.) manageable yard, ideal for those that don't want to become a slave to their surrounds. There is a lovely covered alfresco area; a wonderful spot to enjoy the warmer months of the year. With plenty of room for your own garden ideas and kids/pets to play, all your needs are covered here!
Ideal as a ready made investment (currently rented at $350 per week until June 2020), this property will suit a range of quality home seekers looking for an affordable home to rent or call their own.
Insights: 27 Freeman Drive, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Address: Lot 7/ Wireless Street Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Your New Residential Community
This newly completed land estate in Kangaroo Flat offers everything you need in a new residential community. Located in walking distance to everything Kangaroo Flat has to offer including shops, schools, bus stops, train station, sporting facilities and parks, only an 8 minute drive to the Bendigo CBD and on the Melbourne side of town what is not to like? With lots ranging from 304m2 to 497m2 all fully serviced and in a secured private community which offers maintenance of the common areas. Wireless Street Gardens would be a fantastic location for a host of buyers including first home buyers, professionals and retirees. Titles available so the lots can settle as soon as required also with house and land packages available from local builders!!

Description:
Low Maintenance Entertainer on Large Allotment
Tucked away in a quiet street of Kangaroo Flat is this beautifully presented three bedroom brick entertainer. With two separate living areas, spacious kitchen and large alfresco, this home is perfect for raising a family, downsizing, or a low maintenance investment. Features include:
All three bedrooms with built-in robes, including the main bedroom having access to the bathroom as a semi-ensuite bathroom arrangement
Kitchen with storage galore, a four-burner gas cooktop, 645mm gas oven, dishwasher and ample bench space
Ducted gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling throughout the home
Multiple options for entertainment with two living areas, a separate meals area and a large patio overlooking the delightful and private backyard
9.2m x 6.3m shed with concrete floor and power, plus a 3m x 3m garden shed
Vehicle access through the large double carport with ample space to park a caravan, boat or alike and direct access into the shed
This attractive property is set on a fully landscaped, private allotment in a convenient location. Dont delay; call our sales team to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
Affordable Lifestyle Living
Located within the Karinya Gardens Retirement Village of AVIVA Communities is this beautifully presented home, just a few minutes to the Kangaroo Flat shopping precinct.
Comprising of two bedrooms plus study /third bedroom, all good sized rooms with built-in robes in bedroom 1 & 2 and plenty of storage. This unit offers a bonus study - a very handy place for the home office/craft room. The open plan kitchen, dining and living areas are light-filled with the kitchen being well-equipped to cook that Sunday roast. Gas cook-top, electric oven, ample cupboards, breakfast bar and pantry. Other great features include split-system heating and cooling and for those extra hot days there are ceiling fans in the main bedroom and lounge. Undercover parking for one car, garden shed for extra storage of all those bits and pieces.
Downsize now in comfort in this well established, friendly community village. Only minutes to Crusoe Reservoir with all the walking tracks around you plus bus stops for those non drivers.
Call for an inspection today! Kaylene Disher 0431 039 512.

Description:
VERSATILE 70'S STYLE
* Reminiscent of the popular modernist style of the 1970s, this modest home has been upgraded in all the right places.
* Offering a clean and versatile floor plan with hallmark features including flat roof, floor-to-ceiling windows with wide eaves over a timber-decked and front pergola.
* Light fills every corner of the spacious lounge, adjoining dining and new kitchen kitted out with electric cooking, dishwasher, new cabinetry and pantry cupboard.
* Two robed bedrooms are found at this end of the home with the recently renovated bathroom and main bedroom located at the other end.
* The main bedroom enjoys a walk-through robe and a big window with access to a small front deck.
* Step down to the laundry and an extension encompassing rumpus/playroom with access to the carport and a large, air-conditioned and carpeted room suitable for use as a second living area /4th bedroom or home office/hobby room.
* Further internal enhancements include paintwork so fresh the paint is barely dry, new timber laminate floor to the kitchen/dining/living area, split system air conditioning units and ceiling fans.
* Outside there's a single carport, garage/workshop (6.7m x 4.9m), rainwater tank and a secure, compact backyard ready for your personal touch.
* Ideally situated opposite the Allingham Street Playground flanked by the Kangaroo Flat Railway Station on one side with the Chapel Street Recreation Reserve and dog park on the other.
* It's a short walk to Aldi and IGA supermarkets, Tristar Medical Centre and Kangaroo Flat shopping strip with Bunnings, Bendigo Homemaker Centre and Lansell Square a little further away.
Insights: 239 Allingham Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
ENTERTAINERS MODERN HAVEN
A beautifully refurbished home offering a contemporary and entertainer's lifestyle welcome home to 40 William Drive.
The owners have poured love and attention into every detail of this property's modern refurbishment, and the moment you step onto the landscaped front yard you'll truly feel the quality behind it.
Glide along your stylish stone path up the front door and inside you're greeted by your light and bright open concept living, dining and kitchen.
The gourmet kitchen is sure to impress from its brand-new quality appliances, subway tiling, abundance of storage including soft close draws throughout and extra wide fridge nook.
Peer down the hallway and you'll discover the home's sleeping quarters, main bathroom and laundry.
The master suite offers plenty of natural light, floor to ceiling mirrored built-in robes and a quality refurbished modern ensuite.
Decorative floor to ceiling tiling, stunning mirror, deep bath tub and floating vanity make the main bathroom a standout.
Step outside into your grand entertaining space perfect for hosting large parties and gatherings. The use of materials beautifully compliments each other; from the tiered timber decking, wire railing and large covered patio with stylish fan.

A beautifully refurbished home offering a contemporary and entertainer's lifestyle welcome home to 40 William Drive.
The owners have poured love and attention into every detail of this property's modern refurbishment, and the moment you step onto the landscaped front yard you'll truly feel the quality behind it.
Glide along your stylish stone path up the front door and inside you're greeted by your light and bright open concept living, dining and kitchen.
The gourmet kitchen is sure to impress from its brand-new quality appliances, subway tiling, abundance of storage including soft close draws throughout and extra wide fridge nook.
Peer down the hallway and you'll discover the home's sleeping quarters, main bathroom and laundry.
The master suite offers plenty of natural light, floor to ceiling mirrored built-in robes and a quality refurbished modern ensuite.
Decorative floor to ceiling tiling, stunning mirror, deep bath tub and floating vanity make the main bathroom a standout.

Description:
Contemporary Low Maintenance Living
Stylishly designed and built by a highly regarded local custom builder, this appealing residence is set on its own Title with street frontage, and offers all modern comforts, along with a convenient lifestyle.
Comprises two bedrooms with BIRs, formal entry, open plan kitchen/meals and living, timber decked outdoor sitting area, plus single lock-up garage with direct internal access.
Kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances, and the tastefully selected colour schemes and inclusions are incorporated throughout the townhouse.
Bathroom includes shower, vanity and bath. Residence is kept comfortable through the summer and winter months with split system reverse cycle heating and cooling.
Currently rented to an exceptional tenant at $320 per week until May 2020
Bendigo CBD is easily accessed in under 10 mins drive, whilst local conveniences within walking distance include shopping, train station, new leisure/swimming complex, school, and medical facilities. An exceptional investment opportunity or a stunning property to make your home for comfortable, low maintenance living.

Description:
An Absolute Gem for Family Living
This renovated three-bedroom home in a quiet court location is the perfect place to raise the family and just minutes from the centre of Kangaroo Flat. There's room for the kids to play and kick the footy and two good sized garden sheds out the back for extra storage, This generous block size of 703 square metres allows plenty of space for the family's fur babies to run around. Also there is a large undercover outdoor entertainment area for all those family get-togethers, plus backyard access through the double garage.
This is a very well cared for family home that is affordable. The home offers three generously sized bedrooms with built-in robes, the main bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite, renovated bathroom and large laundry. The renovated kitchen boasts modern appliances and with central heating and evaporative cooling plus split system air conditioning, you will be comfortable all year round.
Don't miss this one - call Kaylene Disher today to book your inspection.

First home buyers or investors, take the opportunity to acquire this neat home only a short walk to the Kangaroo Flat shopping precinct, schools, transport and train station. Description:
Low Maintenance Living in an Ideal Locale
This well maintained timeless red brick townhouse is a proven successful investment property. Being on the desired Melbourne side of town with easy access onto the Calder Highway, this makes a brilliant property for those commuting and with expected rental returns of $350 per week you will not find a better investment property to add your portfolio.
Situated in an established street, just a short 4-minute drive to Lansell Square Shopping Mall with K-Mart, Cotton On, Woolworths, Coles, Cafes and the Post Office. 2-minute stroll to lovely bushlands, ideal for walking the dog.
Accommodation comprises of 3 sizeable bedrooms with built-in robes, main bedroom with ensuite and a walk-in robe. Spacious main living zone flowing through to the open plan kitchen and meals area with ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout.
The kitchen is a fantastic feature of the home, boasting high-quality stainless steel appliances including a built-in oven with gas cooktop, dishwasher, loads of cupboards and direct access to the courtyard, ideal for outdoor dining.
This incredible home is set in a quiet family-friendly street, a short drive to the local primary schools and public transport.
Investors will snap this one up quickly so get in contact fast and book your private inspection or come along to the inspection Saturday.

Description:
REST, NEST OR INVEST
Sound brick veneer ideally situated midway between the Kangaroo Flat shopping strip and Lansell Square shopping centre with childcare with medical rooms and a bus stop in between, will appeal to buyers of various ages and stages of life.
The home offers a gas-heated lounge, dining area adjoining the renovated sparkling white kitchen equipped with Emilia stainless steel gas/electric cooker, dishwasher, pantry with roll-out drawers and island breakfast bar.
Three bedrooms all include built-ins and are served by the updated bathroom with the WC off the laundry.
Added features include split system air conditioning unit, covered outdoor living area in the backyard and low-maintenance landscaping.
Outside, the approx 602m² block includes a single carport under the roofline, a dual driveway providing access to the secure backyard for caravan/ boat/trailer parking and covered outdoor living area all embraced by low-maintenance landscaping.
Insights: 9 Wesley Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.
